diff_act: 3.notify the user that the request has been queued
4.send a signal to turn on the requested unit

regen.absent_element: handling of the LIFO queue when a unit is turned off or a new unit is added to the queue
regen.new_specification: The system shall update the LIFO queue by removing the unit that has been turned off and moving the next unit in the queue to the top for processing if the maximum number of units is not running.

regen.absent_element: removal of a unit from the queue when it is turned off
regen.new_specification: The system shall remove the unit from the queue when the request to turn off the unit is honored.

regen.absent_element: removal of unit from running status when turned off
regen.new_specification: The system shall update the status of the heating or cooling unit to reflect that it is no longer running when a request to turn off the unit is honored.

label: When a request to turn off a heating or cooling unit is received, this process shall first check the LIFO queue and remove the unit-turn-on request from the queue if exists.
absence: action of checking the queue and removing the unit-turn-on request if exists when a request to turn off a unit is received
